section.title: Security - DRM - Watermark - Versions
section.p: The digital editions of Softwijs are not protected with DRM. You don't need a password to read or print them. We want to bring our high quality textbooks to our customers as simply as possible.

However all publications are watermarked. Each digital edition is personalized by visible and invisible attributes connected to the client. Be assured, these characteristics do not contain personal information.
It is allowed to make copies of a file for personal use. However it is not allowed to give files to other people or placing them on servers without permission of Softwijs.
When a new version of this textbook is published, the buyer has the right for a free update.
